title: Link2SD+ Plus 3.5.2 Patched [Fixed]
description:
This is the fixed release of this app.


Your phone must be rooted.

Install Lucky Patcher. Open Lucky Patcher, press menu, then press update.

Install the latest version of Link2SD from the play store.

Lucky Patcher has a working patch for version 3.5.2. Run it, select Link2SD, Patches, Custom Patch. Apply the patch, you should get a 70% patch success. Then launch Link2SD and all features are unlocked.

Note that on my kitkat phone the function to "Create Link" and selecting to Link App Data, the fourth option, causes some programs to run very slowly. Be sure you have a class 10 sd card
